doc.name: Buffer
doc.description:
FIXME

If the capacity changes during execution, and the buffer already contains more tokens than the new capacity, then no tokens are lost, but no new tokens are accepted at the input until the number of buffered tokens drops below the capacity.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: The output port. The type of this output is constrained to be at least that of the input.
doc.property: The capacity of the buffer. To provide "infinite" capacity, set this to a negative number.
